## This post contains two data visualizations, and are as follows

* one Numerical visualization
* one Categorical data visualization

## The first Data visualization concerns ata was extracted from the 1974 Motor Trend US magazine and relates the weight of vehicles to the miles per gallon

```{r}
library(dplyr)
mtcars 
ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg),colour(cyl)) +
  geom_point() 
```
